message: Are there any tutorial to create breadcrumbs nav? I have found https://github.com/multiscan/middleman-navigation but it only works with haml.

It's not clear why that plugin would be haml-only, despite the Readme. If it's system seems to meet your needs, I'd suggest working with the maintainer to add support for your templating engine of choice.
The key to any system of breadcrumbs using the URL is the "request.path" variable. Inspect that and generate links as necessary.
Do you have any plans to include the feature like nanoc? anyway, thanks! Especially, the information about "request.path". I'll inspect that and try to generate navigation.

I'm of the opinion that the best open source software is created by "scratching an itch." I haven't needed a breadcrumb, so I haven't written any support for it. I'd suggest those who need such functionality rally around an extension or submit a bug or pull request describing the feature. Even just writing the test case, describing how the feature would work, is a great idea so somebody with the desire or time can implement it.
